scripts.build:staging: REACT_APP_ENV=staging react-scripts build && rm -rf staging-build/* && mv build/* staging-build/
scripts.deploy:staging: pm2 stop tcup-backend-staging && npm ci && npm run build:staging && sudo cp -r staging-build/* /var/www/tcup/frontend/staging-build/ && pm2 start server.js --name tcup-backend-staging --env staging
scripts.deploy:production: pm2 stop tcup-backend-prod && npm ci && npm run build:production && sudo cp -r build/* /var/www/tcup/frontend/build/ && pm2 restart tcup-backend-prod
